todo-tree.command.filterClear.title: Clear Filter
todo-tree.command.groupByTag.title: Group by Tag
todo-tree.command.ungroupByTag.title: Ungroup by Tag
todo-tree.command.scanWorkspace.title: Scan Workspace
todo-tree.command.addTag.title: Add Tag
todo-tree.command.removeTag.title: Remove Tag
todo-tree.command.exportTree.title: Export Tree
todo-tree.command.showOnlyThisFolderAndS: Only Show This Folder And Subfolders
todo-tree.command.reveal.title: Reveal Current File In Tree
todo-tree.command.resetCache.title: Reset Cache
todo-tree.configuration.title: Todo Tree
todo-tree.configuration.filtering.exclud: An array of workspace names to exclude as roots in the tree (wildcards can be used).
Globs for use in limiting search results by exclusion (applied after **includeGlobs**), e.g. `["**/*.txt"]` to ignore all .txt files.
todo-tree.configuration.filtering.ignore: If true, any subfolders containing a .git file will be ignored when searching.
todo-tree.configuration.filtering.includ: An array of workspace names to include as roots in the tree (wildcards can be used). An empty array includes all workspace folders.
Globs for use in limiting search results by inclusion, e.g. `["**/unit-tests/*.js"]` to only show .js files in unit-tests subfolders.
todo-tree.configuration.filtering.passGl: By default the globs are passed into ripgrep to narrow the search. Set this to false to apply the globs *after* the search (pre 0.0.132 behaviour).
todo-tree.configuration.filtering.useBui: Add VSCode's `files.exclude` and/or `search.exclude` list to the ignored paths.
Don't used any built in excludes
Use the Files:Exclude and the Search:Exclude setting
todo-tree.configuration.general.debug.ma: Create a debug channel in the Output view.
todo-tree.configuration.general.enableFi: Set to true to enable automatic updates when files in the workspace are created, changed or deleted.
todo-tree.configuration.general.fileWatc: Glob for use with the file watcher. Change this if the default setting causes performance issues.
todo-tree.configuration.general.revealBe: Sets where the cursor is positioned when revealing a todo.
Moves the cursor to the beginning of the todo
Moves the cursor to the end of the todo
Moves the cursor to the start of the line
todo-tree.configuration.general.exportPa: Path to use when exporting the tree. Environment variables will be expanded, e.g `${HOME}` and the path is passed through strftime (see <https://github.com/samsonjs/strftime>). Set the extension to `.json` to export as a JSON record.
todo-tree.configuration.general.rootFold: Folder in which to run the search (defaults to the workspace folder).
todo-tree.configuration.general.statusBa: What to show in the status bar - nothing, total count, counts per tag, top three counts per tag or count of tags in the current file.
Only show the scanning status in the status bar
Show the total count of tags in the status bar
Show a breakdown of the count of each tag in the status bar
Show the count of the top three tags in the status bar
Show the count of tags in the current file in the status bar
What to do when the status bar is clicked.
Toggle between showing total count and the top three tag counts
todo-tree.configuration.general.tagGroup: Allows similar tags to be grouped under the same type, e.g. `{ "FIX": ["FIXME","FIXIT"] }`. *Note: All tags must also be in the `todo-tree.general.tags` tag list. If a tag group is defined, custom highlights apply to the group, not the tags within the group.*
todo-tree.configuration.general.tags.mar: List of tags. *Note, if one tag starts with another tag, the longer tag should be specified first to prevent the shorter tag being matched.*
todo-tree.configuration.highlights.enabl: Set to false to disable highlighting.
todo-tree.configuration.highlights.highl: Delay before highlighting tags within files (milliseconds).
todo-tree.configuration.highlights.schem: Editor schemes to show highlights in. To show highlights in settings files, for instance, add 'vscode-userdata' or for output windows, use 'output'.
todo-tree.configuration.regex.regex.mark: Regular expression for matching TODOs. *Note: $TAGS will be replaced by the tag list.*
todo-tree.configuration.regex.regexCaseS: Use a case sensitive regular expression.
Location of your version of ripgrep.
todo-tree.configuration.ripgrep.ripgrepA: Additional arguments to pass to ripgrep (Use with caution!).
todo-tree.configuration.ripgrep.ripgrepM: Size of the buffer to use for retrieving output from ripgrep (kilobytes).
todo-tree.configuration.tree.autoRefresh: Refresh the tree when files are opened or saved.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.disableComp: Prevent the tree from showing compact folders.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.expanded.ma: When opening new workspaces, show the tree initially fully expanded.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.filterCaseS: Set to true if you want the view filtering to be case sensitive.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.flat.markdo: When opening new workspaces, show the tree initially as flat list of files.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.grouped.mar: When opening new workspaces, show the tree initially grouped by tag.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.hideIconsWh: Save some space by hiding the item icons when grouped by tag.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.hideTreeWhe: Normally, the tree is removed from the explorer view if nothing is found. Set this to false to keep the view present.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.scanAtStart: Normally the tree is built as soon as the window is opened. If you have a large code base and want to manually start the scan, set this to false.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.scanMode.ma: Set this to change which files are scanned.
Show badges and SCM state in the tree view.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.showCountsI: Show counts of TODOs in the tree.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.showInExplo: Show the tree in the explorer view.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.showScanMod: This setting is no longer used, please use "todo-tree.tree.buttons.scanMode" instead.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.showScanOpe: This setting is no longer used, please use "todo-tree.tree.scanMode" instead.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.rev: Show a button in the tree view title bar to reveal the current item (only when track file is not enabled).
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.sca: Show a button in the tree view title bar to change the Scan Mode setting.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.vie: Show a button in the tree view title bar to change the view style (tree, flat or tags only).
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.gro: Show a button in the tree view title bar to enable grouping items by tag.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.fil: Show a button in the tree view title bar allowing the tree to be filtered by entering some text.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.ref: Show a refresh button in the tree view title bar.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.buttons.exp: Show a button in the tree view title bar to expand or collapse the whole tree.
Show a button in the tree view title bar to create a file showing the tree content.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.showTagsFro: This setting is no longer used, please use "todo-tree.tree.scanMode" instead.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.sortTagsOnl: Sort items in the tags only view alphabetically instead of by file and line number.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.tagsOnly.ma: When opening new workspaces, show only tag elements in tree.
todo-tree.configuration.tree.trackFile.m: Track the current file in the tree view.
